content:
Section 717(a) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended to change the reauthorization year from 2014 to 2019. Section 722 is also amended to improve the Defense Production Act Committee by changing the responsibilities and authorities of the Chairperson. The President has delegated primary responsibility for government-wide coordination of the authorities in the Act. The Chairperson appoints a full-time employee to coordinate all Committee activities and issue a report each year by March 31. The Chairperson appoints a full-time employee to coordinate all Committee activities and issue a report each year by March 31, including recommendations for legislation actions to support the effective use of priorities and allocations authorities in this Act. SEC. 3. UPDATED RULEMAKING.
    Section 101(d)(1) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended to issue, and annually review and update whenever appropriate, final rules.
SEC. 4. PRESIDENTIAL DETERMINATION.
    Section 303(a) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended to include specific language regarding presidential determination. In section 101(d)(1) of the Defense Production Act of 1950, amendments are made to the determination process, requiring written explanations. Additionally, a new provision is added stating that purchases or actions under this section must be the most cost-effective method. Section 711 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended to authorize appropriations of $133,000,000 for fiscal year 2015 and each fiscal year thereafter. This authorization exceeds $50,000,000 and requires an Act of Congress. The curr_chunk can be summarized as:
